What is the role of electron-diffraction tomography in MOF structure determination?
data.answer: It is used for structure determination of MOFs, especially when crystal size and crystallinity do not permit full structure elucidation.

data.question: What is the main challenge in using EDT for MOF structure solution?
data.answer: Poor sample crystallinity and/or fast degradation of crystals in the electron beam.
